name: Ext_R5_MedicationStatement_informationSource
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationStatement.informationSource for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationStatement.informationSource from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationStatement|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication
element.definition: The person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication. Note: Use derivedFrom when a MedicationStatement is derived from other resources, e.g. Claim or MedicationRequest.
element.comment: `MedicationStatement.informationSource` maps to R4 `MedicationStatement.informationSource`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.short: Person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication
element.definition: The person or organization that provided the information about the taking of this medication. Note: Use derivedFrom when a MedicationStatement is derived from other resources, e.g. Claim or MedicationRequest.
element.comment: `MedicationStatement.informationSource` maps to R4 `MedicationStatement.informationSource`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
